title: Tornado Cash developers to receive funding from new legal defense DAO
description:
An activist group launched a legal defense fund for accused Tornado Cash developers Alexey Pertsev and Roman Storm on Jan. 22. Roman Storm endorsed the fundraiser, stating: “2024 is the year that will define the rest of my life. Honestly, Iâ€™m scared. But also hopeful that this community cares with a passion.
